tribe_name: Ewiiaapaayp Band of Kumeyaay Indians, California

awards.description: SELF GOVERNANCE COMPACTS FY 21 CR1 (19.73%) TPA BASE DIST.
DISTRIBUTIONS FOR SELF GOVERNANCE COMPACTS (TPA BASE) CR1/CR2 AND CONTRACT SUPPORT CR#1 (14.21%) AND CR#2 (7.92%) OF 2019 ENACTED

DISTS. FOR TRIBAL TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM AND TRIBAL TRANSPORTATION PLANNING FOR ACTIVITIES/PROJECTS DESCRIBED IN 23 USC 202(A) AND A FHWA APPROVED TRANSPORTATION IMPROVEMENT PROGRAM (TIP), 23 USC 202(C)(3).

THE FY22 FY23 PROTECT PROGRAM THING VALLEY COMMUNITY ACCESS AND EVACUATION ROUTE PROJECT WILL ADDRESS THE TRANSPORTATION SAFETY DEFICIENCIES ON THE ONLY ACCESS ROUTE IN THE BIG EWIIAAPAAYP SECTION OF THE RESERVATION. THE ACCESS ROUTE IS A 3.79 MILE HEAVILY RUTTED STEEP DIRT ROAD REFERRED TO AS THING VALLEY ROAD. THIS ROAD HAS SHEER DROP OFFS ON THE EAST SIDE FOR OVER HALF OF ITS LENGTH AND IS FREQUENTLY CLOSED DURING SEASONAL STORMS DUE TO SIGNIFICANT EROSION. THE ROAD IS UNSAFE AND A HAZARD TO LAW ENFORCEMENT AND OTHER EMERGENCY VEHICLE ACCESS AND IMPEDES EVACUATION FROM THE
RESERVATION IN THE EVENT OF WILDFIRE.

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
